author: TIME Staff
title: These Are the 10 ‘Most Urgent’ Threats to Press Freedom Amid the Coronavirus Pandemic
description: Journalists around the world are facing new threats as they document the coronavirus pandemic that has killed more than 40,000 people
content:
Journalists around the world are facing new threats as they document the coronavirus pandemic that has killed more than 40,000 people globally.
Mohammad Mosaed, a reporter in Iran who criticized the government’s response to the pandemic, has been barred from… [+7143 chars]
